% if report.till_supplies:

${ _("Till Supplies") }

<% in_sum = 0 %> % for operation in report.till_supplies: <% in_sum += operation.value %> % endfor
${ _("Code") } ${ _("Description") } ${ _("Supplied Value") }
${ operation.identifier } ${ operation.description } ${ format_price(operation.value) }
Total: ${ format_price(in_sum) }
% endif
